title: 雪球轰炸机雪球觉醒1.8
txt_content:
这是一个无聊时做的东西原理很简单代码/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Tile:152,Time:10,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~-18 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~2 ~-12 ~6 {Block:"minecraft:redstone_block",Time:1}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-12 ~10 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-11 ~10 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-10 ~9 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"execute @a ~ ~ ~ kill @e[type=PrimedTnt,r=5]"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-9 ~9 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"execute @e[type=Snowball] ~ ~ ~ summon PrimedTnt ~ ~5 ~ {Fuse:100}"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-8 ~8 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"execute @e[type=Snowball] ~ ~ ~ summon FireworksRocketEntity ~ ~1 ~ {LifeTime:30,FireworksItem:{id:401,Count:1,tag:{Fireworks:{Explosions:[{Flicker:100,Trail:10,Type:3,Colors:[65280],FadeColors:[255]}]}}}}"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-7 ~8 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"execute @a ~ ~ ~ kill @e[type=ThrownPotion,r=3]"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-6 ~7 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"execute @e[type=Snowball] ~ ~ ~ particle portal ~ ~ ~ 0 0 0 0.1 500"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-5 ~7 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"execute @e[type=Snowball] ~ ~ ~ summon ThrownPotion ~ ~5 ~ {Potion:{id:373,Damage:16428,Count:50}}"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-4 ~6 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~-1 ~0 ~ ~-1 ~ ~4 redstone_block 0"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-3 ~6 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~1 ~0 ~ ~1 ~ ~4 stone 0"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~1 ~-2 ~6 ~3 ~-2 ~10 air 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~0 ~5 ~4 ~0 ~11 quartz_block 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~1 ~11 stained_glass 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~ ~11 quartz_block 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~2 ~2 ~4 wall_sign 1 replace {Text1:"{text:\\"关闭系统\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:dark_blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}",Text2:"{text:\\"作者\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:dark_green,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}",Text3:"{text:\\"bruned\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:dark_aqua,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}",Text4:"{text:\\"祝你玩的开心！！！\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:dark_red,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/give @a minecraft:snowball 64"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~ ~ ~22 ~1 air"}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}复制代码



原理在雪球上召唤TNT至于怎么召唤我就不说了
再加一些粒子效果
合药水效果
还有就是不让TNT药水伤害我们
效果图








结束

replies.txt_content:

好大一段指令······
我用了单指令生成器

replies.author: peter-kong
replies.txt_content: 这东西的确很无聊,一点用都没

peter-kong 发表于 2016-1-10 18:58
这东西的确很无聊,一点用都没
可以用它找矿洞

replies.author: 草儿
replies.txt_content: 不过看起来很漂亮的说?(? ???ω??? ?)?

replies.author: _hua_px
replies.txt_content: 这个东西好大威力，用雪球发射几次后，再发射一次。特别多TNT，卡的都要崩溃。这是个BUG吗？？

本帖最后由 2448841275 于 2016-2-1 19:16 编辑 
_hua_px 发表于 2016-1-23 21:22
这个东西好大威力，用雪球发射几次后，再发射一次。特别多TNT，卡的都要崩溃。这是个BUG吗？？ ...
不是是配置问题
